mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LABEL (LABEL_ID, LABEL_CODE, LABEL_NAME, LABEL_TYPE, LABEL_AUTH, LABEL_STATUS, QUOTE_NUMS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY ) VALUES ( #{labelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labelCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelAuth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labelStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quoteNums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
